name: Custom Colors
author: seosbg

sections.description:
This WordPress plugin allows you to change all basic colors in your theme. Simply amazing and easy to use.
To learn more about the Custom Colors please see Plugin URI. See screenshot examples at http://seosthemes.com/custom-colors/
sections.installation:
Install via Plugins > Install New

  1. Search for “Custom Colors”
  2. Click the “Install Now” link
  3. Click “Activate Plugin”

Via ZIP / FTP

  1. Unzip the ZIP file and drop the folder straight into your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is there a tutorial?

See the Tutorial

Where can I find documentation on the plugin?

Refer the Plugin Site
